about.heroText:
Welcome to my portfolio!
Here you can get to know me a little, follow my developer journey and look at what projects i'm working on!

about.title: About me
about.text: Lorem ipsum dolores dei ipsum dolores deiipsum dolores deiipsum dolores deiipsum dolores deiipsum dolores dei

school.title: Graduation
school.text: I graduated as a software developer from Lernia YH in may 2025

profession.title: Tech stack
profession.text:
I am a junior software developer with a strong foundation in both Java and TypeScript. My main areas of focus include building scalable and responsive applications, with experience in both frontend and backend development.

Technologies I am proficient in:

Frontend:
- React
- React Native (Expo)
- HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS

Backend:
- Java (Spring Boot)
- Node.js

Other:
- REST and GraphQL APIs
- Git and version control
- Agile development practices
- Unit testing and debugging

I am passionate about learning new technologies and continuously improving my development skills through hands-on projects and collaboration.

projects.heroText: On this page you can see some of the projects i am working on right now or have worked on in the past!

gameArc.title: GameArc
gameArc.text:
GameArc was a fullstack project i worked on as a degree project for my software developer education.
I am in the process of adding more functionality to it.
